@@ -82,0 +83,4 @@

@@ -88,0 +93,4 @@

+        frameOperator.clickMouse();
+        frameOperator.moveMouse(-1, -1);
+
@@ -119,1 +128,0 @@

@@ -126,3 +134,2 @@

-        // Dismissing the tooltip by mouse click
-        toolTipHostComp.clickMouse();
+        // Dismissing the tooltip by moving the mouse out
+        toolTipHostComp.moveMouse(-1, -1);
